name: Smash The Blue Bird-ie 2 - Hard-est Flappy Resurrection Of Tiny Fatty Yeet
name_original: Smash The Blue Bird-ie 2 - Hard-est Flappy Resurrection Of Tiny Fatty Yeet
description:
******* Free Flapping Bluebird Game! *******

******** Addicting platformer action ********

Help our cute and cuddly bluebird get past pipes in his biggest adventure ever!

Cross your way through worlds of intense platforming madness in this tough-as-nails classic arcade game! This is a retro-style platformer with cute animation, awesome soundtrack and challenging levels!

With exceptionally clever level design, gorgeous graphics and solid platform dynamics you'll want to keep playing and playing.

Have you got what it takes to win in this classic side scrolling action adventure?

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Harness the power of pure fun!

Download FREE Today!
